constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 14 (Monday, January 25, 2021)]
[House]
[Pages H233-H234]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. VARGAS:
H.R. 491.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
(1) To regulate commerce with foreign nations, and among
the several states, and with
[[Page H234]]
the Indian tribes, as enumerated in Article 1, Section 8,
Clause 3 of the U.S. Constitution;
(2) To make all laws necessary and proper for executing
powers vested by the Constitution in the Government of the
United States, as enumerated in Article I, Section 8, Clause
18 of the United States Constitution.

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Water, Oceans, and Wildlife.

title: California New River Restoration Act of 2021
